wikipedia_page.main: Gayatri Nair ( GAH-yə-tree NAH-yər; born 2001) is an Indian-British pianist and singer who was raised in London and performed regularly since she was a child. Nair rose to fame in 2018 when she auditioned for The Voice UK Season 7 and became a semifinalist in the competition placing 6th overall.

response: * 6 May – Gayatri Nair, pianist and vocalist
